tasks.title: [HANDOFF] Claude Code Agent — Cross-Workspace Sync Audit & Continuation
tasks.description:
HANDOFF TASK FOR CLAUDE CODE AGENT 

This task transfers responsibility for code review, audit, and implementation continuation of the Cross-Workspace Database Synchronization project.

 Context: 
- Unified methodology document created: Cross-Workspace Database Synchronization — Unified Methodology
- Main project created: Cross-Workspace Database Synchronization — Implementation
- Phase 1 tasks defined for 4 core functions
- Existing related work: DriveSheetsSync v2.3, Inter-Workspace DB Sync project, Database Synchronization Workflow

 Scope of Work: 
1.  Audit  — Review existing codebase for sync-related functions in DriveSheetsSync and related scripts
2.  Gap Analysis  — Compare existing implementations against unified methodology requirements
3.  Remediation  — Identify and document code gaps, conflicts, or misalignments
4.  Implementation Plan  — Create detailed implementation steps for Phase 1 functions
5.  Handoff Return  — Prepare task handoff back to Notion AI Research Agent with findings and next steps

 Key References: 
- DriveSheetsSync Registry Sync & Compliance Alignment issue (8 linked Agent-Tasks)
- Notion Database Sync Technical Documentation
- Inter-Workspace Database Synchronization Workflow
- Requirements — Database Synchronization Workflow

 API Limitation Note: 
- Notion API v2025-09-03 does NOT expose view metadata — syncDatabaseViewsRegistryForDatabase_ is BLOCKED

 Return Handoff Requirements: 
- Summary of audit findings
- List of existing code that can be reused
- Gap analysis with specific file/function references
- Recommended implementation sequence
- Estimated effort for each Phase 1 function
- Blockers or risks identified

tasks.title: [P1] Implement upsertRegistryPage_ Function
tasks.description: Phase 1 Core Function: Implement the upsertRegistryPage_(registryDbId, pageData) function that creates or updates registry entries in workspace-databases, Properties, and Database Views registries. Must handle idempotent upserts, property validation, and audit logging.

tasks.title: [P1] Implement syncWorkspaceDatabasesRow_ Function
tasks.description: Phase 1 Core Function: Implement syncWorkspaceDatabasesRow_(sourceRow, targetDb) function that synchronizes a single row from workspace-databases registry between workspaces. Must handle schema mapping and ID translation.

tasks.title: [P1] Implement syncPropertiesRegistryForDatabase_ Function
tasks.description: Phase 1 Core Function: Implement syncPropertiesRegistryForDatabase_(dbId) function that synchronizes all property definitions for a given database to the Properties registry. Must extract schema via API and populate registry entries.

tasks.title: [P1] Implement evaluateDatabaseCompliance_ Function
tasks.description: Phase 1 Core Function: Implement evaluateDatabaseCompliance_(dbId) function that validates a database against compliance requirements. Checks parent page location, required properties, schema alignment, and governance standards.

tasks.title: [Cursor MM1] Cross-Workspace Sync — Phase 1 Core Functions Implementation
tasks.description:
HANDOFF FROM CLAUDE CODE AGENT (2026-01-09)

This task transfers responsibility for implementing the 4 core Phase 1 functions required for cross-workspace database synchronization.

AUDIT SUMMARY:
- DriveSheetsSync v2.4 provides foundational infrastructure (Notion API, property matching, logging)
- All 4 required Phase 1 functions are NOT implemented
- Existing functions can be leveraged for implementation

REQUIRED IMPLEMENTATIONS:
1. upsertRegistryPage_(registryDbId, pageData) — Create or update registry entries
2. syncWorkspaceDatabasesRow_(sourceRow, targetDb) — Sync database inventory rows
3. syncPropertiesRegistryForDatabase_(dbId) — Sync property definitions
4. evaluateDatabaseCompliance_(dbId) — Validate database compliance
